mapper.sql: kyMethod.id, kyMethod.app_id, kyMethod.name_en, kyMethod.description, kyMethod.access_method, kyMethod.name_cn, kyMethod.paramter_out_type, kyMethod.paramter_in_type, kyMethod.access_path, kyMethod.othet_msg,kyMethod.affect_content
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ky_method kyMethod WHERE 1 = 1
AND kyMethod.app_id = #{appId}
AND kyMethod.name_en LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameEn}, '%')
AND kyMethod.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{description}, '%')
AND kyMethod.access_method = #{accessMethod}
AND kyMethod.name_cn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameCn}, '%')
AND kyMethod.paramter_out_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{paramterOutType}, '%')
AND kyMethod.paramter_in_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{paramterInType}, '%')
AND kyMethod.access_path LIKE CONCAT('%', #{accessPath}, '%')
AND kyMethod.othet_msg LIKE CONCAT('%', #{othetMsg}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ky_method ( id, app_id, name_en, description, access_method, name_cn, paramter_out_type, paramter_in_type, access_path, othet_msg ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{appId}, #{nameEn}, #{description}, #{accessMethod}, #{nameCn}, #{paramterOutType}, #{paramterInType}, #{accessPath}, #{othetMsg} )

INSERT INTO ky_method ( id, app_id, name_en, description, access_method, name_cn, paramter_out_type, paramter_in_type, access_path, othet_msg ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.appId}, #{item.nameEn}, #{item.description}, #{item.accessMethod}, #{item.nameCn}, #{item.paramterOutType}, #{item.paramterInType}, #{item.accessPath}, #{item.othetMsg} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ky_method
app_id = #{appId},
name_en = #{nameEn},
description = #{description},
access_method = #{accessMethod},
name_cn = #{nameCn},
paramter_out_type = #{paramterOutType},
paramter_in_type = #{paramterInType},
access_path = #{accessPath},
othet_msg = #{othetMsg}
WHERE id = #{id}

update.foreach:
UPDATE ky_method
app_id = #{item.appId},
name_en = #{item.nameEn},
description = #{item.description},
access_method = #{item.accessMethod},
name_cn = #{item.nameCn},
paramter_out_type = #{item.paramterOutType},
paramter_in_type = #{item.paramterInType},
access_path = #{item.accessPath},
othet_msg = #{item.othetMsg}
WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ky_method WHERE id IN
#{id}
